level.text: Consist of a one day billable unit of service, which includes at least three (3) hours of client participation;
Require pre-authorization from DMH for more than ninety (90) days of services within a twelve (12) month period;
Be provided in a DMH-certified community mental health rehabilitation services agency; and
Meet all other requirements set forth in 22 DCMR ยง 3420.
Day services shall not be billed during a community support or counseling encounter.
Day services shall not be billed on the same day as Assertive Community Treatment.
